title: Question 16:
description: How does the performance fee work?

fields.title: Answer
fields.value: Each manager can set their own performance fee, which allows them to mint fees on newly generated profits.  Once a fee has been minted this sets a high watermark which must be continuously beaten to mint more fees.  The performance fee is in pool tokens, so the most successful managers gain more share of their own pool.  A mint fee function is called each time an investor enters or exits a pool, also managers can manually call mint fee manually via UI.
